import Mathlib
open Set Filter
open scoped Real

/-- Suppose z0 âˆˆ â„‚. Show that lim_{zâ†’z0} f(z) = âˆž in the sense of the Riemann sphere iff for every M > 0 there exists Î´ > 0 such that |f(z)| > M whenever |z - z0| < Î´. -/
theorem riemannSphere_tendsto_infinity_iff (f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) (zâ‚€ : â„‚) :
    Tendsto f (ð“ zâ‚€) atTop â†” âˆ€ M > 0, âˆƒ Î´ > 0, âˆ€ z, dist z zâ‚€ < Î´ â†’ M < abs (f z) := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib
open Set Filter
open scoped Real

/-- Suppose z0 âˆˆ â„‚. Show that lim_{zâ†’z0} f(z) = âˆž in the sense of the Riemann sphere iff for every M > 0 there exists Î´ > 0 such that |f(z)| > M whenever |z - z0| < Î´. -/
theorem riemannSphere_tendsto_infinity_iff (f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) (zâ‚€ : â„‚) :
    Tendsto (fun z => abs (f z)) (ð“ zâ‚€) atTop â†” âˆ€ M : â„, M > 0 â†’ âˆƒ Î´ > 0, âˆ€ z, dist z zâ‚€ < Î´ â†’ M < abs (f z) := by sorry

import Mathlib
open Set Filter

/-- Suppose z0 âˆˆ â„‚. Show that lim_{zâ†’z0} f(z) = âˆž in the sense of the Riemann sphere iff for every M > 0 there exists Î´ > 0 such that |f(z)| > M whenever |z - z0| < Î´. -/
theorem riemannSphere_tendsto_infinity_iff (f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) (zâ‚€ : â„‚) :
  Tendsto (fun z : â„‚ => Complex.abs (f z)) (ð“ zâ‚€) atTop â†”
    âˆ€ M : â„, M > 0 â†’ âˆƒ Î´ > 0, âˆ€ z : â„‚, dist z zâ‚€ < Î´ â†’ Complex.abs (f z) > M :=
by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib
open Set Filter

/-- Suppose z0 âˆˆ â„‚. Show that lim_{zâ†’z0} f(z) = âˆž in the sense of the Riemann sphere iff for every M > 0 there exists Î´ > 0 such that |f(z)| > M whenever |z - z0| < Î´. -/
theorem riemannSphere_tendsto_infinity_iff (f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) (z0 : â„‚) :
  Tendsto (fun z : â„‚ => Complex.abs (f z)) (Filter.nhds z0) Filter.atTop â†”
    âˆ€ M : â„, M > 0 â†’ âˆƒ Î´ > 0, âˆ€ z : â„‚, dist z z0 < Î´ â†’ Complex.abs (f z) > M :=
by sorry

theorem riemannSphere_tendsto_infinity_iff (f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) (z0 : â„‚) :
  Tendsto (fun z => â€–f zâ€–) (ð“ z0) atTop â†”
    âˆ€ M : â„, M > 0 â†’ âˆƒ Î´ : â„, Î´ > 0 âˆ§ âˆ€ z : â„‚, dist z z0 < Î´ â†’ â€–f zâ€– > M :=

import Mathlib

/-- Suppose z0 âˆˆ â„‚. Show that lim_{zâ†’z0} f(z) = âˆž in the sense of the Riemann sphere iff for every M > 0 there exists Î´ > 0 such that |f(z)| > M whenever |z - z0| < Î´. -/
theorem riemannSphere_tendsto_infinity_iff (f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) (z0 : â„‚) :
  Filter.Tendsto (fun z => â€–f zâ€–) (Filter.nhds z0) Filter.atTop â†”
    âˆ€ M : â„, M > 0 â†’ âˆƒ Î´ : â„, Î´ > 0 âˆ§ âˆ€ z : â„‚, dist z z0 < Î´ â†’ â€–f zâ€– > M :=

theorem riemann_sphere_tendsto_infinity_iff (f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) (z0 : â„‚) :
  Tendsto (fun z : â„‚ => â€–f zâ€–) (nhds z0) atTop â†”
